content: At the bottom, you'll encounter another Wolf Guardian, but be sure to look to the right after defeating him, and you'll find the second crowned Buddha statue to pray at (A Frozen Corpse Censor Holder is already praying here, but you can cut in line).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Precept Corridor'.
The content is as follows:
At the bottom, you'll encounter another Wolf Guardian, but be sure to look to the right after defeating him, and you'll find the second crowned Buddha statue to pray at (A Frozen Corpse Censor Holder is already praying here, but you can cut in line).
